Master Answer:
Some nurses, pharmacists, physicians and naturopathic physicians can administer flu vaccines. A number of organizations, including private health care agencies, pharmacies and travel clinics offer this service.  This information can be retrieved online by searching for workplace flu clinics in BC or by contacting your local pharmacy or travel clinic. ImmunizeBC does not endorse any one organization and we recommend that you contact the specific organization for details.
Immunization Nurse
